project: Whiskers of Fate: A Cat’s Journey
You’re a house cat, always been one until one day you wake up to see that the human left the front door wide open, do you:
You peek your head outside of the front door and sniff around, You cautiously walk outside and feel the sun on your face that's when you notice:
You chase the butterfly where it leads you to a tall fence do you:
Stay in the yard and keep playing
You continue to play in the yard for what feels like hours, eventually your human comes home and notices you playing and takes you back inside
Everyday you continue to look out the window wondering if you will ever get the chance to go outside again and feel the sun on your fur and play with a butterfly again
When you hop over the fence, you are immediately face to face with another cat do you:
Puff up and hiss at them
Greet them with a friendly meow

You puff up your hair and give an intimidating hiss towards the other cat. They in turn also puff up their hair and hiss at you. You both are locked into a standstill until another cat walks over and meows.
You both stop hissing and look at the other cat curiously. It seems to nod his head and starts walking towards the alleyway. The other cat starts to follow, do you:
You decide that this world is not for you so you run back home and vow never to venture outside again.

You crawl through the window and see a whole lot of cats running around. Some are eating, some look to  be playing. The mysterious cat from earlier leads you into a room that has a lone cat sitting on a pile of blankets and pillows like a throne.

The cat looks at you with  curiosity and wariness in his gaze. He meows to  the other cat which translates to, “I am the Cat King and this is my realm. I see that you are a lone traveler. If you want to stay, then you need to prove that you belong.”  You gulp and look at them with a worried expression. How am I supposed to prove that I belong.

The Cat king then says, “You will have to complete a task, you must sneak into a human house and steal food from them. Only after you complete your task will you be allowed to stay.”  What will you choose?

You simply couldn’t steal something from another. You decline and the Cat King says, “Then it seems that you are not cut out for this life. Leave before I decide to let the others feast on you for food. Never return here again.”
You run out of there like you are on fire and run back towards your house. You run up to the open door, dash inside and hide in the closet vowing never to venture outside again.

The other cat nods their head towards you to follow them. They lead you out into a side street that faces a beautiful house. The other cat points his head at the house and nods at you, giving you the sign that this is the house. You look at it and slowly start going towards the house.

You find an open window on the first floor and slowly crawl through it, the house is eerily quiet and you don’t see anyone around. You head towards the kitchen and open the fridge, inside you see two items, which will you take:

You grab the steak between your teeth, just as you turn around you hear a scream from a human standing right in front of you. You decide to just run and book it between their legs and run out the open door.
You run back towards the cat and you both book it back to the Cat King’s lair

You walk up to the Cat King and present him the steak. He nods his head and says, “you have proven yourself to be worthy. You may stay and join us and forever be a part of my court.”  You nod your head and try to hold in your excitement. 

You are now a part of his court.

You are so excited and so happy and can’t believe how well your life has turned out. You went from being a house cat to a part of a cat empire.  

Who knows what other adventures await you!

You grab the apple between your teeth, just as you turn around you hear a scream from a human standing right in front of you. You decide to just run and book it between their legs and run out the open door.
You run back towards the cat and you both book it back to the Cat King’s lair

You find your way inside and to the Cat King’s lair. You walk up and present the apple that you stole. He looks at you with disappointment and says, “This is not something that we can eat. You have not proven yourself and therefore shall not be invited to stay. Leave before I decide to make YOU the next meal.”

The cat also gives a friendly meow, you see another cat who comes out of the shadows and nods its head towards you. It starts walking down the alley along with the other cat. You decide to follow them
It looked like that cat was giving a sign of approval. You decide to follow both cats into the alleyway.
The cats lead you to a massive building that looks old and run down. They jump up onto a fire escape and enter through a cracked window. Do you:
Decide you are not curious and want to go home
You decide that you do not want to see what is inside of this building and was better off at home with your toys and food.
You cautiously approach the bush, stepping lightly on the grass. The rustling stops for a moment, as if whatever is inside is aware of your presence.
As you creep closer, you make a decision to:
You crouch down low ready to pounce on whatever is inside the bush, as you are just about to jump, a head pokes out of the bush. It is another cat! Do you:
Puff up and hiss at them
Greet them with a friendly meow

The bushes rustle again, and suddenly, a furry, striped face pops out. A raccoon! The your tail puffs up like a bottle brush. The raccoon blinks, staring. You blinks back. A tense silence.Then, the raccoon slowly raises a paw… and dramatically boops you on the nose. What will you do?
You lift your paw and boop them right back on the nose. The raccoon looks at you funnily then  runs towards the fence. Do you:
You rush towards the fence and leap over it with ease. But once you land you see that the raccoon is no where to be found. Instead you see a cat sitting right in front of you. Do you:
Puff up and hiss at them
Greet them with a friendly meow
You decide that it isn't worth it to follow the raccoon, so you decide to head back towards the house to:
Go take a nap in the sun
Today was a crazy day, but worth it to see everything outside. Tomorrow maybe I will try again and see what other adventures are out there!
You launch forward, but the raccoon screams dramatically and scrambles up a fence and climbs over to the other side. Do you:
You decide that it is not woth the effort to investigate and instead decide to go back to the house where you know it is safe!
You decide to ignore the door and go back to lazing away in the window and the early morning sun
